content.raw:
is the `clearSelection()` needed inside the timeout? I thought that something like the following should work:

```
s3keyDataTable.clearSelection()
setTimeout(function(s3keyDialog) {
    s3keyDialog.open()
}, 0, this.$.s3keyDialog)
```

Also, can you be more descriptive about why the timeout is needed (there is a great explanation in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/779379/why-is-settimeoutfn-0-sometimes-useful, check the second answer)
